dialogues.speaker: Fisherman
dialogues.message: Whew. Leon, good to see ya! Where ya been? Everyone was looking for ya.

dialogues.speaker: Fisherman
dialogues.message: I've been tryin' to snag some fish from the river, but those darn skeletons keep spookin' em off. Don't know where they're comin' from.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: I just handled the one by the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Fisherman
dialogues.message: I appreciate it, now I might catch a fish or two.

dialogues.speaker: Fisherman
dialogues.message: How 'bout these dang quakes? Been through the second one in two days.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Second one… in 2 days… Wait, what day is it, fisherman??

dialogues.speaker: Fisherman
dialogues.message: Ya done forgot my name again, huh? Oh well, anyways, it's Friday.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: FRIDAY? IT WAS JUST SUNDAY! I REALLY GOT TO GET BACK TO TOWN!
